wiki.content:
Heaven Is a Place On Earth was released in 1987 and it is Belinda Carlisle's best selling song to-date.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Heaven Is a Place On Earth was released in 1987 and it is Belinda Carlisle's best selling song to-date.

track.name: Heaven Is A Place On Earth
comments: I had such a massive crush on her when I was in high school.
favorite song by her, also like rush hour from another member of the go gos.
A beautiful and strong song. I love it!
God thank you for my husband and giving me a little bit of heaven on earth!!!!

One of the prettyest girl of the 80s!!!
great voice!!!
LOVED THIS GIRL SHE WAS SOOOOoooooooo SEXY!!!!!!!!!!!
Watch out............ galaxy Andromeda is approaching the Milky Way, including our own galaxy. Unknown events will then occur, with or without heaven. :)
negative people don't have to listen to this turn it off !!!
WOW !!! i forgot this classic song !! she is amazing singer !!!
Heaven does not exist, but this song does.......... and so do fools
And if you don't like it, don't listen to it - as simple as that.
It's maybe an old song but great nonetheless!
Heaven is a place on earth but not where i live.
